content.title: The Queen
content.body:
Her Majesty, Queen Aurora IV.
The current ruler of the Aurorian, she's been in charge longer than I can remember.
Despite what some of her opposition thinks, she's actually done quite the job handling our homeland.
She's been able to maintain the ancient dungeons holding the Necromancers, as well as keeping the peace of the land; and improving our economy.
Long live the Queen!
